name: Big Chungus 0.04
description:
Already designed as the GOTY by all major news outlets, "Big Chungus" is THE game you cannot miss!

A : move left

D : move right

Spacebar : jump

Escape : Close the game

You play as Big Chungus, the chunkiest and sexiest chungus int he entire multiverse. You need to reach the flagpole to win the level, and to finish all 5 levels! You win the moment you touch the ground at the botoom of the pit in level 5, so yeah the game is speedrun-friendly :)

World Record currently is 1:19:78

Be careful tho ! Big Chungus will gain weight after each carrots he eats, and there are a lot of carrots on your path!

Who will be the chuungiest? It's up to YOU to find out.
